DOC.brief_title: Anti-Helicobacter Pylori Antibodies ( IgG ) Serum Women With Unexplained Infertility
DOC.detailed_description: Unexplained infertility diagnose accord standard World Health Organization ( WHO ) criterion . All woman study hormonal assessment evaluate ovulatory cycle , thyroid function , circulate prolactin androgen level . The ovarian reserve check measurement serum FSH antral follicle count third day menstrual cycle . Screening infertility also include transvaginal ultrasound hysterosalpingography , exclude possible uterine malformation pathology , assess patency fallopian tube . Male factor infertility exclude couple , accord standard WHO semen analysis . Following admission , patient underwent complete clinical examination detail medical history obtain . A venous sample collect test serum HP IgG seropositivity enzyme link immunoassay HELICOBACTOR PYLORI IgG ( ENZYME IMMUNOASSAY TEST KIT ) .
